Review Text: I‚Äôve only left 3stars for food because I‚Äôve only had the breakfast which is really good great place cheap beer üçªüëçüèª

Not the greatest spoons I've been in came on a busy Saturday evening lots of families in. Always good value and service chips where very greasy could have done with abit more draining. Some good offers on drinks atm a steady 3 stars for this establishment!

We had been on the East lancs steam train and after our journey we we hungry . My dad likes wetherspoons as the food is consistent where ever we go. The food is good as you would expect my five year old seemed happy with it too.

What a fantastic place! A special thanks to Declan who was an amazing person. Declan was friendly, fast, efficient and worked hard at getting food out and helping on the bar too‚Ä¶he even stopped for a short chat. It‚Äôs also a clean and pleasant place overall with a great atmosphere. Thanks again for the warm and friendly welcome üòé
The kitchen has much improved and now produces much better food. Cracking breakfasts are served here üëçüèª

Delightful Weatherspoons in the centre of Heywood. Easy parking in the B&M/Morrison's car park. Breakfast menu until 12 noon with main menu starting from 11.30am. Find a table, choose your food and order at the bar, then the meals and cutlery are brought to your table.  Food arrived quite quickly and was delicious. Whether eating or drinking on your own or as a group/family, you will enjoy the visit here.

Your security staff on your doors need to approach customers in a manner they should do absolutely shocking will be emailing a complaint to your head office regarding this on Saturday night in heywood

Decent food as long as you pick something that couldn‚Äôt go in a microwave! Favourites: Halloumi fries, southern fried strips / Wrap, Nachos (meh), Empire State burger (amazeballllls).
Cheap beer prices as always and no music as per usual, UNBELIEVABLE JEFF!
One of the last bastions of autochthonous English pub culture. Great value for money in food and drinks.
Very depressing small looking meal very dissaponting.
Excellent place to enjoy a few drinks or just the one , lots of special prices, excellent
Called in when passing through, was completely comfortable here, pub was clean, tidy and appeared well run. Cheap drinks and nice friendly staff. Enjoyed it.

I am not happy with the service i received today. God knows who put that table directly next to the toilets and on top of that having two tables with 9-6 so you didn‚Äôt know what number to put for ordering your food and drink, 3 different people came to me and said you have put the wrong table number as if i didn‚Äôt know that from the from the 1st person telling me while I'm eating my food it just rude. Also the table was disgusting and full of empty glasses, messy environment. Wont be going here again‚Ä¶

It is absolutely brilliant place. Food is fantastic and really well priced, the staff is wonderful and it gives that impression of good old English pub where You can meet people, have a nice chat or just to enjoy a cold pint or brew. Love it to bits!
Not beer I'm used to , but OK .seemed very friendly.

A very busy pub. My pizza was very greasy with oil dripping off it. The worse I‚Äôve had from a spoons. Pint was not bad. Tables were a bit scruffy. Not the best.

Edit: I asked for fish and chips today and I was impressed with the fish. It was hot, the skin was crispy and the cod was just right. A fair amount of chips and the peas are just peas which were alight. Added another star. Also, place was cleaner than before.

They want to sort there staff problems out without fail you are always waiting at the bar I worked in pubs for yrs nothing worse then havein to wait. after waiting for someone to come behind the bar in the first place .then to say they had to get a bottle of brandy and to be honest I think they went to bargain booze for it they took that long. and this was only 12-30 pm they should make sure this is all done in the morning before opening

Went here for breakfast. Easy to order at the bar and didn't have to wait too long for food to be served. A bit confusing with the coffee machines but was sorted out in the end. Food was as expected from a Wetherspoons, alright grub for not too much.
You can't go wrong with Spoons in Heywood. The service is always super quick and the food is always exactly what you expect, tasty, hot and delicious at reasonable prices.
As good as any Spoons. No complaints.
This is a good spoons! The food is better than expected - and I tried it 4 times just to make sure üòä ‚Ä¶

Went in recently and there was a little problem with a few beers but the staff were really good and resolved the issue and even some customers stepped in to help. A very friendly pub with a good atmosphere.

Food is great (as usual) staff are fantastic. My partner was asked to move seats due to accidentally sitting it an area reserved for a staff meeting.  The staff were extremely friendly about it all and even offered me a free drink to say sorry.  They didn't have to do that but it absolutely made my day.

It seems like you get a nice mixed grill around once in five visits . Tonight's was about the worst I've had all the meat was extremely well done bordering on inedible considering its steak night tonight I expected a lot better on the plus side the onion rings were lovely they actually tasted like onion not crispy batter..
Good spoons. Not the biggest outdoor space. Fab Katsu curry.üëå ‚Ä¶

Very busy cheap food but tasty we had streak on steak night and Thursday we had the curry club I had the nega curry it was HOT HOT HOT üî• ü•µ  BUT I LOVED IT.I also went for Breakfast yesterday with my partner and son we had the large breakfast the tradition breaking and the small...all good size portions and and great prices ‚Ä¶
Food ok, can't always eat in peace.It is not a restaurant it's a pub for SOME serious drinkers so can be noisy. Most of the time  it's clean, serves good coffee & various price/sized breakfasts.
No dogs allowed even sat outside? Embarrassing for everyone involved. No skin off my nose plenty more pubs around but will never buy another pint here again.

Extremely disappointed with our shocking experience today.
No idea where to start!!
We visit Heywood Wetherspoons around once a month usually it‚Äôs ok.
Todays visit was absolutely shocking
We ordered on the app staff came to tell us some items were not available so what else did we want when I asked I was told whatever üò°
Then when  our food arrived I was given chips with my sandwich when we asked for no chips but salad on the app.
Not once did a member of staff come to ask us was everything ok with our food because it wasn‚Äôt at all the burger and sandwich was extremely bland.
We then ordered some drinks through the app again and ordered real ales this all went through then some time later another member of staff appeared to say we don‚Äôt have the ales so yet again we had to pick something else.
The staff were going around as if they didn‚Äôt want to be there no smile very unfriendly not one of them said anything like thank you or your welcome
It‚Äôs very disappointing because this is not what customers expect

Bleeding rip off, basically.. The food was awful, I ordered a chicken tikka curry, it was absolutely awful. It wasn't like it used to be. Then the poppadoms with it were stale along with the rice not being cooked right. I don't recommend this place anymore.

Great food at a good price with a drink included.
Wide variety of drinks at cheap prices.
App ordering available although the table numbers aren't right on the app for Heywood.
Have issues when ordering cocktails as either the ingredients aren't available or the bar staff don't know how to make it.
Michelle is absolutely fantastic, always go to her if she's serving.

Usually very good, lively with a great selection of cask and craft beer at an amazing price. Atmosphere is usually also warm with a somewhat eclectic mix of people. Few loons in the last time I was here snorting coke off the bog seat and dribbling all over the place. Apart from these examples of human wreckage a very enjoyable place to visit. Service is always spot on.

Love having food and drink delivered using app.
Would like tables to be wiped down more often
Toilets like every spoons were gross but good atmosphere for a cheap night out
It's alright I suppose ssdd a few characters who are dodgy bar that it's not bad as the central in shotton

The tables were full of empty glasses and dirty tables.The toilets were full of toilet paper on the floor,I was there for 3 hrs 30 mins ,the same as I left. They obviously don't employ enough staff. the staff are doing there best under difficult circumstances,no wonder they don't look happy.i certainly wouldn't eat!

always a good atmosphere .
food is always quality and served quickly
prices are a breath of fresh air
Been here many times excellent food and fast service efficient friendly staff.and the price is amazing... üëçüòÅ ‚Ä¶

Definitely one of the more entertaining Spoons.
Full of 'interesting' characters.
Bar service is a little slow but the food arrived quickly. Worth a trip just to see the locals in their natural habitat

Great stopping place before you go to Liverpool airport. A pie and chips sought of place I usually get the gammon or mixed grill and I've never been disappointed, wouldn't please the wive on our anniversary, but a good stop over none the less.
Eat here on a regular basis. Food is excellent  staff always friendly,  helpful and polite.
A relatively small pub for a Wetherspoons, but not small on character. Quality food, well kept beers and ciders and, as always, a great mix of people.
Lovely pub, great staff, clean toilets, bought my daughter a meal and it was done fast and lovely will definitely come again

Working class pub, ok a bit of bad language here & there but overall earthy friendly locals. Beers on the day (when I visited) were mainly Moorhouses (albeit a good choice) but for me they're far too generic. Luckily they had Phoenix Arizona on tap so my day was saved. Pleasant enough staff, although annoyingly I was served a couple of short pints. Sadly the toilets had suffered from some vandalism but no complaints with the cleanliness. Overall, much better than a few of the local pubs but the beers (although well conditioned) lack any imagination & choice, so there is room for improvement.
Excellent pint of real ale and good value for money food.

This is my local pub and I keep telling the same story. Every person I talk to makes the same complaint. How difficult is it to take note of who comes to the bar and in which order and serve them accordingly? It is not difficult. How many arguments at the bar are started about who is served first? Come on, it's not rocket science, just pay a little bit of attention instead of laughing and giggling in the back. It's basics, where is the trainING? Come on managers, are you not seeing what is happening? Ask your customers!
Large breakfast, good, eggs a  little too runny but good. I don't know how they cut bacon that thin but I keep going. It's good value. Would recommend it.
Smashing place and lovely staff. Food really good, reasonable price, cant believe drink is included with some meals. Great place for a quick tea.!

Good pub but often very cold at night.
Regulars believe heating is turned down deliberately late on to get rid of patrons.
Staff tell customers that this is one of the worst pubs in the Wetherspoons chain.This is an insult to the people of Heywood
Had a good breakfast. The pub was quite busy for an early Sunday morning, will go back.
Nice little pub with good service. Had the hotdog which was lovely and the onion rings were fab but wasn‚Äôt keen on the chips. They tasted like oven chips which I‚Äôm not too crazy about.
Very good prices for food and drinks
I was told this was not one of the best Wetherspoons, but I found it clean, tidy and welcoming with good service.  Thank you.
Too small crowded and not dog friendly even outside. Can't really recommend it
Nice food and beer fast service. Superb!
1st visit here but my 279 wetherspoons.Food I  ordered was excellent and the staff polite and courteous
Cheap and very cheerful good food and nice pint staff very helpful

We had our wedding function at this pub on the sixteenth of march 2013. The best day of our lives. Suoperb staff. Superb management. We couldn,t of asked for more. Service and food was beyond what we exspected, We are locals and thought thay wouldnt have a wedding. But you never ask you never  get. It was the best day ever. All we can sy is a big thank you. If you whant a small function please ask  im sure they will a blidge. A big huge thank you..
Alcohol and food to the usual Wetherspoons standard, Service and bar staff were great. I think the interior needs an overhaul, dated and tired compared to others I have visited.

Went in this weekend and got spoke to shockingly over a miss understanding with a drink. I asked to speak to the manager as an older lady told me to near by because she couldn‚Äôt believe how I‚Äôd been treated and still nothing was done about it.

Disappointed that last night, I ordered a ham and mushroom pizza via the app, staff came to say they didn't have any mushrooms so I had to change my order. Yet my friend ordered a chicken melt, which came with a mushroom on it!!

Been in here for the 2nd time takes 20mins to get a drink
Staff need to realise who has been waiting longest in the queue
Always a good start to the night here. Cheap drinks, nice atmosphere and a heated outdoor area!

This place needs knocking down ! Last week gents toilets floor dirty and standing in .... Our friend finds the manager to tell him & his reply was I've only been here a few days. These toilets are near to people eating & kids playing on the floor where does the .... go?  into the carpets where kids are playing ! Toilets flooded twice in few weeks pub closed because of it !
Great food and drink at a good price
Place ok. Staff friendly, did not have food. Very loud clientel.
Great beer, food and prices, friendly staff, recommend.

Great 'original' cocktails & interesting smells. A proper 'boozy dazzler' & that's the 'real (ale) deal'. (the chips are cheap too)!

To many beers on and they change that many times you cannot get use to any one of them. Camra is now an excuse to stick beers on with weird  recipes which most after two pints make you full or your ill.
Typical wetherspoons.  Good clean .pub.. with  Knowledgeable staff.  Good variety of wines and beers ..  a pub more than a gastro pub xx

Fantastic! Good ale and food. Grab a booth if you can. Not a 10/10 but certainly good and great value for money.

One of the better spoonz in this area, the food is always spot on and the staff are really nice

The pub in Heywood where everybody who lives here has probably been at least once. Cheap beer, friendly staff, but always busy and you stick to the floor even at 11am.. Somebody needs to donate a mop.

Typical Wetherspoons. Good selection of drinks and great pub grub all at very reasonable prices. Very popular.
